Initializer# init(decodingCString:as:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+tvOS 9.0+

```
init<Encoding>(
    decodingCString nullTerminatedCodeUnits: String,
    as encoding: Encoding.Type
) where Encoding : _UnicodeEncoding
```

Deprecated
